message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $13,500 is a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
